author: TRACY T
title: Happy at the Library Hotel -
text:
We were very pleased with the service and hospitality offered at the Library Hotel in New York City. It was a dream to stay at this hotel while visiting NYC for our birthdays. The staff went out of their way to recognize my milestone birthday and help us navigate the city. The available books in our room were clever and interesting along with the added perk of free books in the main lobby. Our room was small but comfortable and accessible for my spouse who uses a cane. The breakfasts each morning were fresh and good quality along with the opportunity to visit the second floor throughout the day for coffee, tea, water and treats. The staff was so kind and helpful with our luggage, dinner reservations and transportation. It was an excellent hotel and we would stay again.
